page.title: 17A Day in the Life of A.Blair
page.content: In no time at all it is{1300 {hours.}Time to go downstairs and re_open the shop and Post Office.My wife rushes off to the hairdressers.I am on my own _ No my mother is here to help while I continue with the Post Office accounts and serve another rush of customers who,by some amazing sense of timing appear from nowhere just as I open the door! It is about 15.35 Martin has just arrived home from school and as usual he goes straight to the sweet counter.He gets a playful clip around the ear as he pushes past me into the house.Who is he bringing home today _ Stephen,Robert,Peter? { 1600 hours}My Post Office accounts are complete;I breathe a sigh of relief.they have balanced first time so no checking over the figures a second time.
